description:
Bunji`s class has a short kanji test tomorrow, but Bunji can`t remember the kanji.  Mom has a plan to predict which kanji will likely be on the test, but...; Mom is disappointed by Bunji`s test results today too when the three Spirits of Eduction appear. The three spirits don`t get along and somehow, a competition between them begins; Mom gives Fumi a Marie Antoinette DVD as a reward for helping out. Fumi is really excited, but as she watches, she unexpectedly understands how easily a woman`s heart changes; Bunji hated sleeping since nursery school.  His reasoning is  "That`s because it`s a waste of a day going away." As Mom tries to find a way to put him to sleep, Bunji is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mountain Test / Spirits x3 / A Princess`s Heart / Not Wasteful Boy
テストのヤマ / せいれいさん / 姫のこころ / もったいない君
